column5: AUY as I think about it selling that mine was a good longg term call If you think about the uncertainty of the economy a mine would be worthless if your company goes bankrupt from the unknown By selling they are guaranteeing their future through sustainability You dont get profits if the economy falls and are stuck paying high interest rate debts
AUY long term I see alot of upside
